OrgName.entry: JOINT LEARNING DISABILITIES SERVICE, SHEFFIELD HEALTH AND SOCIAL CARE NHS FOUNDATION TRUST

Desc.entry: Provides services to adults with a learning disability and their carers in the form of specialist health care and regular support that enables people to live in the community. The service includes: health support teams, respite care services, assessment and treatment unit, older carers support scheme, community assessment and intensive support service, Sheffield Case Register, in-patient beds, domiciliary care and supported living service, and residential and nursing home services.

Pubs.entry: Newsletter for Carers; Information leaflets about services

DisabledAccess.entry: Some parts of the building have wheelchair access and disabled toilet, please contact for details
